snippet: Would-be Mars pilgrims must count on living, and dying, some 140 million miles from Earth. Nevertheless, there is demand for one-way tickets.
abstract: Dutch nonprofit venture called Mars One is planning to send four people--two women and two men--to Mars by 2025 and is seeking potential candidates for mission; response from aspiring space travelers has been strong, despite fact that trip would be one way and those chosen would live out remainder of their lives on red planet.
lead_paragraph: Would-be Mars pilgrims must count on living, and dying, some 140 million miles from Earth. Nevertheless, there is demand for one-way tickets.

headline.main: A One-Way Trip to Mars? Many Would Sign Up
headline.print_headline: A One-Way Trip? Many Would Sign Up
